name: ZB MED – Research Data Infrastructure (RDI) – Textpublikationen
description: ZB MED's Research Data Infrastructure (RDI) is a platform for publishing, archiving and reusing research data from the life sciences and related disciplines: providing as much openness as possible, while maintaining the necessary level of closure. This approach is in compliance with the DFG Code of Conduct 'Guidelines for Safeguarding Good Research Practice' and the principles of quality-oriented open science. Data of commercial origin or from business activities is excluded.
